text:
We're looking for a freelance Marketing Automation Specialist to help us out as-needed. Typically that's been about 10-15 hours/week but it varies. We're looking for help not just with HubSpot but also with Google's website tools (GTM, GA4, GSC).

Would _love_ if the person was also an SEO expert familiar with Semrush. (That might be a bit much, but we're backfilling a unicorn and we're also open to hiring a separate SEO freelancer.)

We're looking for freelancers, not agencies, and they must be in the USMCA (US, Mexico, or Canada). Folks who do not meet those requirements will not get a response.

You can see the full job details and apply here:
<https://www.ashandelle.com/job/marketing-automation-specialist>
